title: The Champ Master Challenge
body:
http://cdn.mdjunction.com/components/com_joomlaboard/uploaded/images/hello_there_kitten-7bdba52e4181c79e56933fb9620f7351.gif#kitten%20saying%20hello%20gif

Welcome random individual of the board

You have stumbled upon a master challenge thought up by one of the boards most notorious and chaotic individuals!

**Me**

https://tse2.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M19abfe77c9810924c334d2ce19e310ecH0&pid=15.1

Now some may turn and run, acceptable response 

But if you are brave enough... I PRESENT TO YOU MY CHALLENGE

Here's how this game works

https://tse2.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M2add31783286decb6eba49fcd2a97a33o0&pid=15.1

In a comment, post your best 3 champions and mastery lvl (according to personal page of your account)

Next post your preferred positions and least favourite positions

*Example:*

1: Shaco (lvl 5)
2: Taric (lvl 5)
3: Kha'zix (lvl 4)

(Noob)

Fav: No pref
Hate: ADC


Finally, post the comment here 

https://tse4.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M67f3a2b6c1f34f185551dc1ebe66a373H0&pid=15.1


**NOW HERE'S WHERE THE CHALLENGE KICKS IN**

People reply to that comment with the name or icon of a champion
 
First 3 are your options for mastery

Choose 1 that you have not already mastered and get it to a minimum of mastery lvl 5 or to your top 3... If you want

Post a screenshot back here once you've been successful

**IF YOU ASK FOR A CHALLENGE, PLEASE ALSO BE NICE AND COMMENT A CHAMPION ON SOMEONE ELSES CHALLENGE, THANK YOU**

*Note*
Do not choose champs about to be reworked or any being affected by the Assassin update... That's just Rude...

**ANY QUESTIONS...**

No?

Then let's start... Here's mine:

1: Shaco (lvl 5)
2: Taric (lvl 5)
3: Kha'zix (lvl 4)

Fav: No pref
Hate: ADC


**Note:** I have an In Real Life ban due to real life things I have done and won't be able to do mine for a while

http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2012/271/e/7/let_the_games_begin__by_00747-d5g5fpo.jpg

Edit: My choices 

1: Draven
2: Urgot 
3: Yasuo

Well... Looks like I'm becoming an Urgod when I get back

Not too hard for me considering the last 2 games I had on him...

(Look up the match history of them if you would like... Might startle you a tad)

replies.body: {{champion:27}}  Because it looks a lot like you don't run away often

considering riot tried shoving him bot.

Well. Adc's are the ONE class who builds pure offense with literally zero defense.
I suck at squishy champs not named Viktor so I need champs who are tanky enough not to instantly die if you sneeze at them.
You can try playing graves then

2. Janna (lvl 7)
3. Zed (lvl 7)

Actually, both Bard and Morg have more points than nunu (bard 69k, morg 40k), getting S on nunu was much easier because i did it in normals with my friends.

Hate: ADCs
Master Yi

Few were tossed at me, however I have 200 ip and I don't have {{champion:136}}  or {{champion:203}} .   : /

> 3: Sona (lvl 6)

> Hate: Jungle / Mid

How about Annie support?
https://media3.giphy.com/media/GtB8bJ7Oypody/giphy.gif

1: {{champion:245}} Ekko - 124,684 (Lv 6)
2: {{champion:79}} Gragas - 96,494 (Lv 6)
3: {{champion:42}} Corki - 40,571 (Lv 5)

Fav: Jungle
Hate: ADC

Notes: I have Level 6 Masteries on {{champion:24}} Jax and {{champion:45}} Veigar; don't ask for them. I played {{champion:42}} Corki mid (got level 5 playing him AP poke, swapped to hard AD build). I only have 254 Mastery points.

I picked Garen based on the fact that most of your picks are mobile, high AP damage champs. 

Garen is durable like Gragas, but AD focused and his kit requires a different style of thought (perhaps)

I try to give people choices different from their normal picks in order to have them diversify more, if he isn't for you, perhaps someone else will give you a better choice to suit you

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bYO91n8U,comment-id=00450001,timestamp=2016-08-02T23:23:51.498+0000)
>
> I picked Garen based on the fact that most of your picks are mobile, high AP damage champs. 
> 
> Garen is durable like Gragas, but AD focused and his kit requires a different style of thought (perhaps)
> 
> I try to give people choices different from their normal picks in order to have them diversify more, if he isn't for you, perhaps someone else will give you a better choice to suit you

I have 230 Mastery points on Garen, and I have playing against him down pat.

I have a fairly diverse pool of champions at the top tier of my mastery.
Level 5+: {{champion:245}} Ekko, {{champion:79}} Gragas, {{champion:24}} Jax, {{champion:45}} Veigar, {{champion:42}} Corki, {{champion:48}} Trundle, {{champion:113}} Sejuani, {{champion:64}} Lee Sin, {{champion:81}} Ezreal, {{champion:41}} Gangplank, {{champion:150}} Gnar, {{champion:36}} Mundo, and {{champion:96}} Kog'Maw.

Tanks, Bruisers, Fighters, Mages, Marksmen...hell I even build/play Lee Sin and J4 like freaking Assassins with the 70 Armor Pen build. I'm no one-trick, and I'm kinda proud of that. Though, if I had to choose what to take into Ranked, my Ranked stats speak for themselves as I favor tank junglers. :)

Finally, yes, I'll do the Garen machine. He has a similar feel to Eve and Trundle in terms of mobility, so I shouldn't do TOO bad with him.

Nice to see a diverse one

Get out there and show them some Grade S Justice
